sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: SERPENTA RIUS, in astronomy, a conſtellation of the northern hemiſphere, called also Ophiuchus, and anciently Æsculapius The ſtars in the conſtellation Serpentairius, in Ptolemy's catalogue, are 29 ; in Tycho’s
15 ; in Hevelius's 40 ; in the Britannic catalogue they are 74.
